name: Black Diamond Half Dome Helmet - Women's
description: Ponytailed or woolly-toqued, your head will fit inside this classic helmet. The shape and  adjustment range should give you a comfortable fit, even if most other helmets feel like a bucket or your head.Moulded EPS foam interior and polycarbonate shell exterior are extremely durable.Shell and suspension design is ponytail friendly for a comfortable fit.Ventilation ports help regulate temperature, expel moisture, and improve breathability.Tuck-away suspension system packs up inside the helmet for more compact stowage in packs or haul bags.Wheel adjuster provides precise adjustment for quick, fine-tuned fit.Headlamp clips slot directly into the mould of the helmet for secure attachment.Fits head circumferences 52-58 cm.
